content:
Hi everyone,

I have tried to generate eicr report with new ersd.json taken from https://ersd.aimsplatform.org/. but due to this file eicr report didn't generate but with old ersd.json i.e. in https://github.com/drajer-health/eCRNow/tree/master/documents/app-artifacts working fine and it's generate eicr report as expected.
Please help me about the issue

Thanks
Suprakash

Hi Everyone,

Now it's resolved with latest build.
